articles.title: After vastly different performances led to the same result, the Kings face a crossroads heading into Game 5 - LA Kings Insider
articles.description: On Saturday, 12 hours after Game 3, I asked Blake Lizotte and Adrian Kempe whether a 6-1 loss was easier to move past than if they were to say lose 3-2 in overtime, playing well but coming up short. My thought process was, the Kings knew well before the final…

articles.author: Jeff Passan
articles.title: MLB to address uniforms after player complaints, per memo - ESPN
articles.description: Major League Baseball plans to address its uniform fiasco after changes this spring to the standard jerseys and pants led to widespread complaints from players and fans, according to a memo obtained Sunday night by ESPN.
